data.title: Tech's top seven companies added $3.4 trillion in value in 2020
data.text: Big Tech got much bigger in 2020, and Tesla joined the pack of mega-cap tech stocks after climbing ninefold.

data.title: 3 Top Stocks to Own for 2021 Regardless of Risks
data.text: 2020 is almost hindsight now and today we have three stocks to own for 2021 that are sure winners. They won this year and they will next.

data.title: Is FB Stock A Buy? Facebook Business Is On A Roll, But Antitrust, Apple Fight Weigh
data.text: Facebook's business is on a roll, but the stock is struggling as state and federal antitrust lawsuits seek a breakup and an Apple privacy move threatens key revenue. The post Is FB Stock A Buy?

data.title: Albion: Big tech has done well with or without economic stimulus
data.text: Jason Ware of Albion Financial Group discusses whether large cap tech names will continue to be the market leaders in the new year.

data.title: FAANG Stocks: Is it Time for a Pause?
data.text: Dec.31 -- Alan Higgins, chief investment officer at Coutts, says it's time to rotate into cyclical from growth equities since the FAANG stocks (a group of dominant internet platform companies based around Facebook Inc., Amazon.com Inc., Apple Inc., Netflix Inc. and Google's parent Alphabet.) look so overvalued.
